title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 322.2 - Payment of the ordinary death benefit upon the death of certain retirees
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 322.2 - Payment of the ordinary death benefit upon the death of certain retirees

State Regulations

On or after January 1, 1976, upon the death of a pensioner
within 60 days following the effective date of retirement who had not made an
effective election of an option, and who: (a) had not been furnished with a retirement
estimate within one year prior to the date of retirement; or
(b) was furnished with a retirement estimate
less than 14 days prior to the date of death; the ordinary death benefit shall be paid to his designated
beneficiary as provided in sections
60
(a) and
360
(a) of the Retirement and Social Security

Law. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 2
ยง
322.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
